title: Bet with a Bad Boy
description: From New York Times bestselling author Cassia Leo.She’s the youngest blackjack dealer at the new Billionaire Club on the Vegas Strip.He’s the devastatingly handsome heir to an oil fortune, and he has two addictions: gambling and girls.What could possibly go wrong?When the board of directors at Westbrook Oil give Ryder Westbrook one last chance to clean up his act, he takes a hard gamble on Kara Langley, the blackjack dealer who rocked his world with a fiery one-night-stand. All he has to do is get her to agree to a little bet. Okay, a big bet. If Kara pretends to be Ryder’s fiancée and spends the weekend with him at a corporate retreat, successfully convincing the board not to fire him, he will give her one million dollars.Kara can’t believe her luck. She’s spent the past year, since her father’s diagnosis, struggling to pay his bookies and medical bills. The last thing she needs is to get involved with another gambler. Especially one who frequents the Billionaire Club and has a reputation as bad as Ryder Westbrook. If her boss catches her with Ryder, she'll lose her job. But if she takes him up on his bet, she won't need her job anymore.
author: Cassia Leo
